QuestData.Title: Assault and Battery
QuestData.Description: We need to report our position to the Alliance navy ASAP!$B$BI am building a new transponder to send a distress signal, but I need a battery from the Skyfire's communications console.$B$BYou'll find the console at the top of the ship - I just hope those undead haven't put their creepy, bony fingers on it yet!
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover the Transponder Battery from Dread-Rider Malwick.
QuestData.CompletionText: I cannot build a new transponder without that battery!
QuestData.RewardText: NUTS and BOLTS!$B$BPardon my language.$B$BThis thing is almost as dead as the guy you took it from. We need juice, and lots of it. I have an idea...
